price: 9. Aquel a Quien pertenece la soberanía de los cielos y de la tierra. Y Al-lah es testigo de todas las cosas.
arabic: ٱلَّذِي لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ شَهِيدٌ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: alladhī lahu mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wal-lahu ʿalā kulli shayin shahīdun
